__e: Yes, I thought with my knowledge and experience, why should I allow retirement to stop me?
Having the knowledge and the power to do what people want that they're unable to talk about is both a blessing and a curse.
Honestly, I don't know what to say when I hear men of your deep knowledge and experience talk like that.
But the man cannot live knowing that the people are suffering and he could help.
Please, I can't die knowing that you hate me.
I forbore, knowing that he would grow tired of her, and he did.
But the man cannot live knowing that the people are suffering and he could help.
Please, I can't die knowing that you hate me.
I forbore, knowing that he would grow tired of her, and he did.
Either way you get off on sitting across from men who haven't seen a woman in years knowing that we're gonna go back to our cells and rub one out thinking of you.
And when we finally lock them up... well, I've been fantasizing about calling my partner to give him the good news, and then finally relaxing with a stiff drink... knowing I've done my job.
I will draw comfort in the knowledge that you're alive to think it.
- But it's a common knowledge. - Exactly!
For if knowledge is power then a god am I!
You see, knowledge is one thing. But faith... faith is another.
